rows.label: tlk41100152_02_msg0001
rows.name:
I wonder if older brother
Elnoth is okay... I hope he's
not lonely and crying...

rows.label: tlk41100152_02_msg0002
rows.name:
I wonder if it was like this
when Dad went away, too...

rows.label: tlk41100152_02_msg0003
rows.name:
It's a little lonely, but this
time I think I have to be the
one to protect Morike.

rows.label: tlk41100152_02_msg0004
rows.name:
So, I'm going to follow my
brother's example and study
to become a Driver!
